Indian Economy.title: Modi’s GST 2.0 plan is much more than a Diwali gift: It’ll give India’s economy a structural upshift
Indian Economy.summary: The restructuring of the GST regime goes beyond simply reducing rates and will give consumption a boost through long-term efficiency gains. It would assure businesses of sustained demand and revitalize private investment. Simply put, we can expect our economy…

Indian Economy.title: ‘World not just watching India, but counting on it’: PM Modi woos investors during two-day Japan visit
Indian Economy.summary: PM Narendra Modi addressed the India-Japan Economic Forum in Tokyo even as the nation looks at newer avenues for growth in the wake of a 50% trade tariff rate imposed by the US, which could hit key sectors.

Indian Economy.title: Indian economy grew 7.8% in April-June quarter
Indian Economy.summary: Indian economy recorded a growth rate of 7.8 per cent in April-June quarter (Q1) of Fiscal Year 2025-26, Government reported on Friday. This is highest after 8.4 per cent after fourth quarter of fiscal year 2023-24.

Indian Economy.title: India's Q1 FY26 GDP likely to grow to 7% from 6.5% in Q1 FY25: UBI
Indian Economy.summary: GVA growth for Q1 FY26 estimated at 6.7%, a marginal increase from 6.5% in same quarter last year, but slightly below 6.8% registered in Q4 FY25

Indian Economy.title: Self-reliance: No, India’s swadeshi wheel has not come full circle
Indian Economy.summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s nuanced interpretation of this Gandhian legacy keeps India open to investment, focuses on job generation and rids self-reliance of any autarky taint. Plus, in the context of US tariffs, it’s geopolitically savvy too.
